snippet: Carlos Pena hit a grand slam against C. C. Sabathia in the first inning, and his game-ending hit against Mariano Rivera in the ninth led the Rays past the Yankees.
abstract: Tampa Bay Rays first baseman Carlos Pena hits a grand slam against New York Yankees starter C C Sabathia in the first inning, and his game-ending hit against Yankees closer Mariano Rivera in the ninth leads the Rays past the Yankees.
lead_paragraph: Carlos Pena hit a grand slam against C. C. Sabathia in the first inning, and his game-ending hit against Mariano Rivera in the ninth led the Rays past the Yankees.

headline.seo: Rays’ Carlos Pena Comes Up With Two Hits to Celebrate Against Yankees
headline.main: Two Swings, Two Hits to Celebrate for Pena
headline.print_headline: Two Swings, Two Hits To Celebrate For Pena
